discourse_list.title: Article: DAI Takes the Reigns as the Leading Decentralized Stablecoin by Market

content.content: I like to see this ! As per the article (and as we know) " [f]ollowing the demise of the Terra-based stablecoin UST, the fiat-pegged token DAI has become the largest decentralized stablecoin in existence today. Moreover, Makerdao has regained the decentralized finance (defi) protocol’s position as the top defi protocol in terms of total value locked (TVL)." The peg is strong. let’s keep going! Anyone else excited ?    Bitcoin News – 29 May 22    DAI Takes the Reigns as the Leading Decentralized Stablecoin by Market... Following the demise of the Terra-based stablecoin UST, DAI has become the largest decentralized stablecoin in existence today.  Est. reading time: 2 minutes
It’s bittersweet as it’s more of they failed rather than us succeeding per se. Once we have more solid revenue and efficiency, we might cheer more.

The negative point of this is that the absence of competition tends to produce a lack of motivation for constant growth, so we just have to not let ourselves be carried away by this feeling, but to improve ourselves more and more every day. I am sure that robust decentralized competition will come at some point.
Completely agree, the failure of others should not be a reason to rejoice, ego is never good.

Hey, it is what it is. However we got here, we are here. And a success doesn’t have to be some affirmative win or gain. During all the turbulence, to still be standing (and leading I suppose?) is a good way to keep the momentum going and to onboard. I now try and be a glass half full person after spending most of my life as a pessimist.

Hi @cryptenthusiastic Here’s a thought for you on competition as “northstar”. Slight mindshift can make a big difference.    linkedin.com    Lovers are Winners The short version of this post is this: focus on connecting with your customer and serving them right - and generally think a lot less about your competition and what they are doing. Lennon had it right.  Reading time: 4 min read
All you need is love. Love is all you need.
Perfect! Couldn’t have said it better myself!
